subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Louisville, the top seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament, played like it until the end. The Cardinals roared back from a 12-point deficit and seized control of the game, defeating Michigan.
snippet: Louisville, the top seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament, played like it until the end. The Cardinals roared back from a 12-point deficit and seized control of the game, defeating Michigan.
